archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.2.7a: a) protect memory against misuse by malicious or compromised applications (e.g. by enabling Data Execution Prevention (DEP) and using Address Space Layout Randomisation (ASLR))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
